sentences: Raymond Donnez (September 9, 1942 â€“ March 7, 2019), or Don Ray, was a French disco producer, arranger and performer.
He also produced Santa Esmeralda's hit cover of "Don't Let Me Be Misunderstood" and their third LP, "House of the Rising Sun".
His single "Got To Have Loving" had cross-over success on pop radio, and reached #44 in the Billboard Hot 100 in October 1978.
The disco stomper "Midnight Madness" is only available on UK 12inch.
